Type Alias# DictionaryLiteral

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+SwiftDeprecated

```
typealias DictionaryLiteral<Key, Value> = KeyValuePairs<Key, Value>
```
